#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,i,c=1;
    char str[102];
    vector<string> v;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%s",str);
        v.push_back(str);
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.begin()+n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(i+1<n&&v[i+1]==v[i])
            c++;
        else
        {
            cout<<v[i]<<" "<<c<<endl;
            c=1;
        }
    }
}
